reptiles.fact1: This Is The Only Freshwater Turtle With Flippers Like A Seaturtle
reptiles.fact2: Living Entirely In Water, They Only Come On Land To Lay Eggs
reptiles.fact3: They Can Grow Up To 27.5 Inches Long And Weigh 66lbs
reptiles.fact4: Fly River Turtles Can Live Around 30 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Captive Bred Babies Approximately 2 Inches In Shell Length
reptiles.fact2: Feeding On Hatchling Pellets, Bloodworms, Fish, Crickets And Shrimp
reptiles.fact3: Adults Are Able To Reach Up To 18 Inches In Shell Length
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Can Live 30-50 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Captive Bred Babies Approximately 1-2 Inches In Shell Length
reptiles.fact2: This Is The Largest Species Of Musk Turtle With A Head Like A Snapping Turtle
reptiles.fact3: Bottom Feeders That Are Naturally At Home In Shallow Bodies Of Fresh Water
reptiles.fact4: Adults Average Around 14 Inches In Shell Length And Can Live 25+ Years

reptiles.fact1: Captive Bred Babies Approximately 6-8 Inches In Length
reptiles.fact2: They Like Feeding On Silverside Fish, Crickets And Worms
reptiles.fact3: Adults Can Reach Up To A Whopping 18 Inches And Weigh As Much As 33lbs
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Turtles Can Live 40-75 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Captive Bred Babies Approximately 2-3 Inches In Shell Length
reptiles.fact2: Adorable Turtle With Pointed Snouts For Digging In Sand
reptiles.fact3: Be Sure To Provide A Basking Dock, Heat And UVB Lighting
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Turtles Can Live 20-30+ Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Fast And Hungry Little Swimmers Feeding On Turtle Pellets Regularly
reptiles.fact2: Living In Fresh Water From Slow Flowing Rivers To Long Standing Ponds
reptiles.fact3: Adults Will Average In Sizes Around 10-11 Inches In Shell Length
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Turtles Can Live 50+ Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Brilliantly Colored With Gold, Brown, And Black Patterns From Head To Tail
reptiles.fact2: Approximately 18-24 Inches, Adults Can Grow Up To 4-5 Feet
reptiles.fact3: Constrictor Snake Feeding On Live Hopper Mice Weekly
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care And Setup These Snakes Can Live 20-25 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Very Hardy Species That Comes From The Hot/Dry Desert
reptiles.fact2: Approximately 6-10 Inches, Adults Can Reach Up To 24 Inches In Length
reptiles.fact3: These Will Burrow Under The Sand To Pop Up And Surprise Their Prey
reptiles.fact4: If Kept Properly This Species Can Live Up To 10 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: This Species Is Well Known For Being The Iconic Large Constrictor
reptiles.fact2: Roughly 20-26 Inches In Length, Adults Can Grow Over 20 Feet Long
reptiles.fact3: As An Adult These Are Able To Feed On Rabbits, Chickens, Goats And Pigs
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Pythons Can Live 20-40 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Known for Their Large Teeth, These Can Be Aggressive, So Look Out
reptiles.fact2: Bright Emerald Green Boas And Make For Excellent Display Animals
reptiles.fact3: Full Grown Adults Can Grow 6-7 Feet In Length From Head To Tail
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Boas Can Live Up To 15-20 Years

reptiles.fact1: Also Known As True Redtail Boas Due To The Extreme Color On Their Tail
reptiles.fact2: Approximately 24 Inches, Adults Can Reach Up To 6-8 Feet In Length
reptiles.fact3: Boas Can Give Birth To 30-50 Live Babies At A Time
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care And Set Up Care These Boas Are Able To Live Up To 20-25+ Years

reptiles.fact1: Approximately 15 Inches, Adults Will Average 5 Feet In Length
reptiles.fact2: Will Eat Other Snakes Including Their Own Species And Venomous Snakes
reptiles.fact3: Species Originates From North America Currently Only Found In Florida
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Snakes Can Live Up To 10-15 Years

reptiles.fact1: This Is Known As The Jesus Lizard Since It Can Run Across Water
reptiles.fact2: Approximately 6-12 Inches, Adults Can Reach Around 2 Feet In Length
reptiles.fact3: These Lizards Are Swift Agile Predators That Feed On Crickets And Meal Worms
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care And Set Up They Can Live Up To 5-8 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Known For The Large Frill Around Their Head They Can Stick Out In Defense
reptiles.fact2: About 5-10 Inches, Adults Will Grow To About 18-24 Inches
reptiles.fact3: These Are Docile, Easy To Handle And Great For Beginners
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Lizards Can Live 10-15 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: These Make Excellent Pets And Are The Dogs Of The Reptile World
reptiles.fact2: About 10-13 Inches, Adults Will Average Around 3-3.5 Feet In Length
reptiles.fact3: Diurnal Hunters, Active During The Day And Sleeping In Burrows At Night
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Tegus Can Live 20-25 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: Can Make Loud Growling Noises, Local People Call Them 'The Devils In The Trees'
reptiles.fact2: A Great Example Of Island Gigantism, They Can Grow Up To 14 Inches
reptiles.fact3: Can Walk Up Glass Using Its Padded Feet Like Other Geckos
reptiles.fact4: Taken Care Of Properly, They Can Live Around 20 Years Long

reptiles.fact1: Also Known As 'Glass Lizard', They Have No Legs And Are Not Snakes
reptiles.fact2: About 5-7 Inches, Average 18-24 Inches In Length As Adults
reptiles.fact3: Burrowing Species So Be Sure To Provide A Thick Substrate
reptiles.fact4: With Proper Care These Can Live Up To 8-10 Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: The True Dragon Of The Sky, Uses Its Ribs To Create A Gliding Wing
reptiles.fact2: Approximately 5-9 Inches In Length From Head To Tail
reptiles.fact3: Voracious Hunters Feeding On Small Crickets And Other Insects
reptiles.fact4: Living Roughly Around 5-10+ Years In Captivity

reptiles.fact1: A Common Turtle In The Eastern United States
reptiles.fact2: It Eats Bugs, Fish, And Anything Else It Can Put In Its Mouth
reptiles.fact3: These Turtles Can Grow Over 8 Inches Long
reptiles.fact4: It is an easy turtle to maintain and that has made it one of the most commonly owned
